mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_id, id, product_id, product_count) values(seq_cart.nextval, #{id}, #{product_id}, #{product_count})
mapper.update: update cart set product_count=#{product_count} where cart_id = #{cart_id}
mapper.select: select cart_id, p.product_id, c.id, name, image, product_count, price, (price*product_count) totalPrice from member m, cart c, product p where m.id=c.id and c.product_id=p.product_id and m.id=#{id} order by cart_id
select * from cart where id = #{id} and product_id = #{product_id}
